help_description: Type !help [command] for more info on a specific command; works also with a list of commands separated by a blank space.
help_short: Type !help to get the list of available commands.
help_spell: To automatically increment the dice to roll, add a number in the message (the **character level** for cantrips and the **used spell slot** for normal spells).

dic_local_help.adv:
Rolls dice and chooses the highest.
The syntax is **!adv nds+c**, where n=number of dice, s=amplitude of dice, c=list of modifiers. Can make multiple rolls separating dice with a blank space.
dic_local_help.cento: Rolls a single d100; no input required.
dic_local_help.coin: Tosses a coin; no input required. It has a 1/256 chance to give a tie.
dic_local_help.dis:
Rolls dice and chooses the lowest.
The syntax is **!dis nds+c**, where n=number of dice, s=amplitude of dice, c=list of modifiers. Can make multiple rolls separating dice with a blank space.
dic_local_help.elvenchad:
Rolls 2d20 (with also modifiers), rerolls the least and chooses the highest.
The syntax is **!elvenchad k**, where k=list of modifiers.
dic_local_help.explode:
Rolls input dice and explode the result; it can sum modifiers.
The syntax is **!explode dk+mods**, where k=dice and mods is a list of modifiers.
dic_local_help.forall: Rolls some dice and add modifiers to each result. The syntax is the same as !tira.
dic_local_help.help: You are very mad if you've asked me this... why?
dic_local_help.join: Let the bot joins the voice channel where you are connected into.
dic_local_help.leave: Disconnects the bot from voice channels
dic_local_help.member: Sends as DM the number of member of this server; it doesn't count bots. Works only for admins.
dic_local_help.pg:
Creates a random character, selecting the race, the class, the sizes and its statblock.
You can add pairs 'key=value' to your message to set specific details during the creation (for example the race or the class). The available keys are **'level'**, **'race'** and **'class'**
dic_local_help.race: Generates race height and weight according to d&d 5e table. The syntax is **!race name**, where name is the race you have (in italian or english)
dic_local_help.redo: Repeat any command. You can activate it by replying to it and writing !redo.
dic_local_help.spell:
Get the list of available spells you can cast.
To cast a spell, send !<spell_name> <lv>.
dic_local_help.stats:
Rolls 4 dice and sums the three highest.
The syntax is **!stats x**, where x=many stats to generate (max 6).
dic_local_help.superstats: Generates three times six stats to grant the user to pick one combination among 3
dic_local_help.tira:
Rolls multiple dice (with also modifiers).
The syntax is **!tira nds+c**, where n=number of dice, s=type of dice (among 2 and 256) and c=modifiers.
If you put a +/- beetween dice, results will be sumed; if you put a blank space in between, separated results will be returned. Isolated numbers will be ignored, unless
dic_local_help.tpc:
Rolls 1d20 and sums modifiers.
The syntax is **!tpc x**, where x=modifiers (you must specify the sign).
dic_local_help.ts:
Make a saving throw.
The syntax is **!ts x <y**, where x=modifiers as in !tpc and y=dc of the saving throw.
